description: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist, and armored superhero.
Super-soldier and the first Avenger, wielding his iconic shield.
God of Thunder, wielder of Mjolnir, and prince of Asgard.
Scientist exposed to gamma radiation, turning into a green-skinned behemoth when enraged.
Master spy, assassin, and skilled hand-to-hand combatant.
Master archer and marksman with exceptional skills in hand-to-hand combat.
Reality-warping mutant with powerful magical abilities.
Synthetic android with superhuman strength, density manipulation, and energy projection.
Military officer and armored superhero with advanced weaponry.
King of Wakanda, skilled warrior, and wearer of the Black Panther suit.
